Key Match Events: DeMar DeRozan scored nine of Sacramento’s 11 points in the second overtime
The game was tied at 102 at the end of regulation and at 112 after the first overtime
Jaquez missed a pair of free throws with 3 seconds left in the first overtime
Post-Match Reflections: The Heat are 4-7 without Jimmy Butler this season
Sacramento is playing with a lot more heart and effort under Christie than it did the final two weeks under former coach Mike Brown
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Kings won their second straight without injured point guard De’Aaron Fox
The Heat were winless in three overtime games on the road this season
